summary: The document is a secret communication from May 1978, detailing the absence of known interactions between the Vlaamse Militanten Orde (VMO) and American citizens during 1968-1970. It highlights the decision not to compile a report on the VMO for the House of Representatives Committee and the resistance to forwarding articles from annual reports to the committee. The communication also references the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992 and is classified as a deferred telecommunication.
key_findings: No known contacts between VMO members and American citizens from 1968 to 1970.
Decision against preparing a report on VMO for the House of Representatives Committee.
Opposition to sharing annual report articles with the committee.
keywords: President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992
